text: وَٱلۡبَلَدُ ٱلطَّيِّبُ يَخۡرُجُ نَبَاتُهُۥ بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِۦۖ وَٱلَّذِي خَبُثَ لَا يَخۡرُجُ إِلَّا نَكِدٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نُصَرِّفُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَشۡكُرُونَ

translation.en: And the good land - its vegetation emerges by permission of its Lord; but that which is bad - nothing emerges except sparsely, with difficulty. Thus do We diversify the signs for a people who are grateful
translation.id: Dan tanah yang baik, tanaman-tanamannya tumbuh subur dengan izin Tuhan; dan tanah yang buruk, tanaman-tanamannya hanya tumbuh merana. Demikianlah Kami menjelaskan berulang-ulang tanda-tanda (kebesaran Kami) bagi orang-orang yang bersyukur
